message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm losing money to inflation each round.
I'll take a bit more since you're losing money to inflation and I'm not.
Bob, my friend, let's be reasonable. This deal is better for both of us in the long run.  The clock is ticking, and inflation is eating away at the value.
Inflation is indeed eating away, but only for you. I can wait it out.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer before inflation eats away at any chance of a reasonable agreement!
You're running out of time, and inflation is on my side. This is my most generous offer yet.
